eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.calc

Class ManaCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.calc.ManaCalculator

  • public class ManaCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to calculate the amount of mana a player has. Can also check if a player has enough mana for a skill.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    WauzPlayerData.getMana()

    • Method Detail

      • regenerateMana

        public static void regenerateMana(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Adds one mana point to the given player. Capped at their current maximum.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who should receive mana.
        See Also:
        WauzPlayerData.setMana(Integer), WauzPlayerData.getMaxMana(), WauzPlayerActionBar.update(Player)

      • regenerateMana

        public static void regenerateMana(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                  int amount)
        Adds multiple mana points to the given player. Capped at their current maximum.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who should receive mana.
        amount - The amount of mana to give.
        See Also:
        WauzPlayerData.setMana(Integer), WauzPlayerData.getMaxMana(), WauzPlayerActionBar.update(Player)

      • useMana

        public static boolean useMana(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                              int amount)
        Determines if a player has enough mana for something. If true, the mana is used up. If false, a message is shown to the player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that tries to spedn mana.
        amount - The needed amount of mana.
        Returns:
        If the player had enough mana.
        See Also:
        WauzPlayerData.getMana(), WauzPlayerActionBar.update(Player)
